question: Analyze the social media activity of companies in the technology industry to identify engagement trends and interactions.

subtasks.task: Select companies from the CompanyInfo table that belong to the technology industry.
Retrieve engagement metrics from the CompanyFacebookDetail table for the selected companies to analyze Facebook activity.
Gather Twitter engagement data from the CompanyTwitterDetail table for the same companies to compare performance on Twitter.
Fetch Instagram activity from the CompanyInstagramDetail table for the selected companies to analyze engagement on Instagram.
Compile the collected data from all social media tables to identify overall engagement trends across platforms for the technology industry companies.
